00219         mpq_class* getR(int32_t o, int32_t m, int32_t j, int32_t i) {
00220             int32_t* query = new int32_t[4];
00221             query[0] = o;
00222             query[1] = m;
00223             query[2] = j;
00224             query[3] = i;
00225             mpq_class* result = r_cache->getValue(query);
